title: Looking to create a AOE team apply with in
body:
Plat and above fun team keen to wreck face

We are currently looking for

TOP    &  JUNGLE must main both well
MID
ADC  &  SUPPORT main both well





If you wish to apply please fill out the following
Example;

Age: 18
Location: Perth
Rank: Plat 2
Position: ADC
Champion Pool:  Must be AOE champs

working Mic?: pings will do

replies.body:
Age: 17
Location: Vic
Rank: Plat 2
Position: MID
Champion Pool: Velkoz,Xerath,Syndra,Jayce,Zed
working Mic?: yes

Age: 20
Location: Syd
Rank: Plat 5
Position: ADC
Champion pool: All Marksman champs have played.
